languages.text: "Да низачем. На шпилях многое делается низачем, просто ради интереса или для удовольствия. Это Комморра, миг радости здесь зачастую — то немногое, что лежит между твоими жизнью и смертью. Пока ты осознавал{mf||а}, как я тебя подставил, я знатно развлекся. Вот и вся выгода".

"There's nothing in it for me. In the spires, plenty of things are done for no good reason, just because, or for pleasure. This is Commorragh — a moment's pleasure here is often the only sliver between your life and death. I was having a delectable time while you were still in the dark. That's what I got out of it."
languages.original_text: "Да низачем. На шпилях многое делается низачем, просто ради интереса или для удовольствия. Это Комморра, миг радости здесь зачастую — то немногое, что лежит между твоими жизнью и смертью. Пока ты осознавал{mf||а}, как я тебя подставил, я знатно развлекся. Вот и вся выгода".

traits.locale_text: "There's nothing in it for me. In the spires, plenty of things are done for no good reason, just because, or for pleasure. This is Commorragh — a moment's pleasure here is often the only sliver between your life and death. I was having a great time while you were still in the dark. That's what I got out of it."

"There's nothing in it for me. In the spires, plenty of things are done for no good reason, just because, or for pleasure. This is Commorragh — a moment's pleasure here is often the only sliver between your life and death. I was having a great time while you were still in the dark. That's what I got out of it."

"There's nothing in it for me. In the spires, plenty of things are done for no good reason, just because, or for pleasure. This is Commorragh — a moment's pleasure here is often the only sliver between your life and death. I was having a great time while you were still in the dark. That's what I got out of it."

"There's nothing in it for me. In the spires, plenty of things are done for no good reason, just because, or for pleasure. This is Commorragh — a moment's pleasure here is often the only sliver between your life and death. I was having a delectable time while you were still in the dark. That's what I got out of it."

languages.text: “对我来说并没有什么好处。在尖塔里，很多事情都没什么理由，仅仅是为了愉悦。这里是科摩罗，在这里，生死之间往往只有片刻的快乐时光。当你还在黑暗中摸索时，我已经享受到了令人愉悦的时光。这就是我的生活方式。”
languages.original_text: "There's nothing in it for me. In the spires, plenty of things are done for no good reason, just because, or for pleasure. This is Commorragh — a moment's pleasure here is often the only sliver between your life and death. I was having a delectable time while you were still in the dark. That's what I got out of it."

traits.locale_text: “对我来说并没有什么好处。在尖塔里，很多事情都没什么理由，仅仅是为了愉悦。这里是科摩罗，在这里，生死之间往往只有片刻的快乐时光。当你还在黑暗中摸索时，我已经享受到了令人愉悦的时光。这就是我的生活方式。”

languages.text: «No saco nada tangible. En las torres, muchas cosas pasan porque sí, o por placer. Estás en Commorragh, donde un momento de placer puede ser la diferencia entre la vida y la muerte. He pasado un rato estupendo mientras te debatías en la oscuridad. Eso es lo que he sacado».
languages.original_text: "There's nothing in it for me. In the spires, plenty of things are done for no good reason, just because, or for pleasure. This is Commorragh — a moment's pleasure here is often the only sliver between your life and death. I was having a delectable time while you were still in the dark. That's what I got out of it."

traits.locale_text: «No saco nada tangible. En las torres, muchas cosas pasan porque sí, o por placer. Estás en Commorragh, donde un momento de placer puede ser la diferencia entre la vida y la muerte. He pasado un rato estupendo mientras te debatías en la oscuridad. Eso es lo que he sacado».

languages.text: 「私にはなんの得もない。尖塔ではいろんなことが理由もなく、あるいは快楽のために行われる。それがコモラフというもの――ここでの一瞬の快楽が、生と死を分ける唯一の境界線だ。貴様が暗闇をさまよっている間、私は愉悦の時を過ごした。それで十分だ」
languages.original_text: "There's nothing in it for me. In the spires, plenty of things are done for no good reason, just because, or for pleasure. This is Commorragh — a moment's pleasure here is often the only sliver between your life and death. I was having a delectable time while you were still in the dark. That's what I got out of it."

traits.locale_text: 「私にはなんの得もない。尖塔ではいろんなことが理由もなく、あるいは快楽のために行われる。それがコモラフというもの――ここでの一瞬の快楽が、生と死を分ける唯一の境界線だ。貴様が暗闇をさまよっている間、私は愉悦の時を過ごした。それで十分だ」

languages.text: "Ich habe nichts davon. In den Türmen wird vieles ohne guten Grund getan, einfach so, oder zum Vergnügen. Wir sind in Commorragh — ein kurzer Augenblick des Vergnügens ist hier oft der einzige Spalt zwischen Leben und Tod. Ich habe mich köstlich amüsiert, während Ihr noch im Dunkeln getappt habt. Das hatte ich davon."
languages.original_text: "There's nothing in it for me. In the spires, plenty of things are done for no good reason, just because, or for pleasure. This is Commorragh — a moment's pleasure here is often the only sliver between your life and death. I was having a delectable time while you were still in the dark. That's what I got out of it."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe nichts davon. In den Türmen wird vieles ohne guten Grund getan, einfach so, oder zum Vergnügen. Wir sind in Commorragh — ein kurzer Augenblick des Vergnügens ist hier oft der einzige Spalt zwischen Leben und Tod. Ich habe mich köstlich amüsiert, während Ihr noch im Dunkeln getappt habt. Das hatte ich davon."

languages.text: « Rien. Dans les tours, on fait beaucoup de choses sans raison, par simple envie ou plaisir. Vous êtes à Commorragh ; ici, une seconde de plaisir marque bien souvent la différence entre la vie et la mort. J'ai passé un très bon moment pendant que vous pataugiez dans les ténèbres. Voilà ce que j'ai gagné. »
languages.original_text: "There's nothing in it for me. In the spires, plenty of things are done for no good reason, just because, or for pleasure. This is Commorragh — a moment's pleasure here is often the only sliver between your life and death. I was having a delectable time while you were still in the dark. That's what I got out of it."

traits.locale_text: « Rien. Dans les tours, on fait beaucoup de choses sans raison, par simple envie ou plaisir. Vous êtes à Commorragh ; ici, une seconde de plaisir marque bien souvent la différence entre la vie et la mort. J'ai passé un très bon moment pendant que vous pataugiez dans les ténèbres. Voilà ce que j'ai gagné. »

languages.text: "Bir çıkarım yok. Kulelerde sebepsiz yere çok şey yapılır. Öylesinedir, belki zevk içindir. Burası Commorragh. Yaşamla ölüm arasındaki çizgiyi çizenin bir anlık haz olması işten değil. Sen karanlıktayken müthiş vakit geçiriyordum mesela. Çıkarım buydu."
languages.original_text: "There's nothing in it for me. In the spires, plenty of things are done for no good reason, just because, or for pleasure. This is Commorragh — a moment's pleasure here is often the only sliver between your life and death. I was having a delectable time while you were still in the dark. That's what I got out of it."

traits.locale_text: "Bir çıkarım yok. Kulelerde sebepsiz yere çok şey yapılır. Öylesinedir, belki zevk içindir. Burası Commorragh. Yaşamla ölüm arasındaki çizgiyi çizenin bir anlık haz olması işten değil. Sen karanlıktayken müthiş vakit geçiriyordum mesela. Çıkarım buydu."
